mapper.sql: SELECT app_id, token, jsapi_ticket, ticket_time, c_time, token_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO viewol.wx_token ( app_id, token, jsapi_ticket, ticket_time, c_time, token_time ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{token}, #{jsapiTicket}, #{ticketTime}, #{cTime}, #{tokenTime} )
mapper.update: update viewol.wx_token set token = #{token} , token_time=#{tokenTime} where app_id = #{appId}
update viewol.wx_token set jsapi_ticket = #{jsapiTicket} , ticket_time=#{ticketTime} where app_id = #{appId}
